hero.titleLine2: and your job search prep is done
hero.lead: Generate a skill map, learning roadmap, job matching insights and interview practice within 60 seconds. Designed especially for web engineers in their first 1â€“3 years to see the big picture and choose the very first step for their next move.

items.title: Choose your goal
items.desc: Pick one direction you want to move towards, such as â€œFrontend specialistâ€ or â€œFullstack engineerâ€.

items.title: Describe your skills & experience
items.desc: Write what youâ€™ve done so far in natural Japanese. You can start from the sample text and tweak it.

items.title: See the big picture
items.desc: Use the skill map and readiness score to see what to improve and which kinds of roles might fit you.

guide.title: New here? Try a quick demo first
guide.description: In about 60 seconds, youâ€™ll get a personalized career diagnosis tailored to your profile.
guide.howToBody: On the right, click â€œInsert sample textâ€ and submit. You can instantly see what kind of result this tool produces.
guide.dashboardText: to review past diagnoses and 1on1 practice sessions
guide.aboutText: to read about the design decisions and tech stack

features.title: What this tool can do
features.subtitle: A single diagnosis gives you most of what you need to start your job search.
features.items: Generate a skill map and a simple â€œclass/jobâ€ profile for you|Propose 30-day / 90-day roadmaps and a concrete task for today|Highlight matching score and missing skills for target job posts|Provide 1on1-style interview practice with AI feedback|Organise and export your portfolio projects as Markdown

demoGuide.title: Home: starting point of the diagnosis
demoGuide.description: Enter your experience here, then click â€œInsert sample textâ€ â†’ â€œLet AI generate my skill mapâ€ to move to the result screen as shown in the demo video.

skillMapHistory.title: Skill Map history
skillMapHistory.description: Review how your overall skill balance has changed across recent diagnoses.
skillMapHistory.loggedInNote: Showing only diagnoses linked to your signed-in account.
skillMapHistory.guestNote: Youâ€™re not signed in, so all public diagnoses are shown here (demo mode).

errors.listFetchDefault: Failed to fetch the list of skill maps.
errors.listFetchGeneric: An error occurred while loading the list.
errors.sessionsFetchGeneric: An error occurred while loading 1on1 sessions.

checklist.title: Job preparation checklist
checklist.subtitle: Not just scores â€“ quickly see how far youâ€™ve progressed on the key preparation items.

items.resume_updated: Update your resume with your latest projects
items.github_ready: Organise links to your GitHub / portfolio projects
items.job_research: Pick at least 3 target job posts
items.interview_practice: Do at least one 1on1 interview practice in the last 7 days

usageGlance.title: Recent usage
usageGlance.subtitle: Quick numbers based on your saved diagnoses and 1on1 practice sessions.

retention.title: Job preparation reminder
retention.line1: Itâ€™s been {days} days since your last diagnosis.
retention.line2: Advancing your learning roadmap or doing a 1on1 practice now will give you a fresh â€œrecent growth storyâ€ to tell in your next interview.

scoreTrend.title: Skill score trend
scoreTrend.subtitle: See how your total skill map score has changed over time.
scoreTrend.empty: There arenâ€™t enough diagnoses yet to show a trend. Once you have at least two, changes will appear here.
scoreTrend.sparklineCaption: Left bars are older, right bars are the most recent. If the right side is generally higher, your overall skill map is trending up.

categoryTrend.title: Category mini-trends
categoryTrend.subtitle: Compare your last two diagnoses to see which areas improved or declined.
categoryTrend.empty: Once you have at least two diagnoses, mini-trends for each category will appear here.
categoryTrend.noImproved: There were no categories with a positive numeric change this time.
categoryTrend.noDeclined: No categories decreased this time. Overall youâ€™re at least keeping your level.

tagline.frontend: You lean towards frontend work with a strong focus on UI/UX.
tagline.backend: You lean towards backend work, with strength in business logic and data design.
tagline.infra: You have an infra-oriented mindset, caring about stability and operations.
tagline.ai: Youâ€™re keen on integrating AI capabilities into products.
tagline.tools: You enjoy optimising workflows and toolchains to maximise development productivity.

oneOnOne.title: 1on1 practice overview
oneOnOne.subtitle: See how many practice sessions youâ€™ve done and how your scores are trending.
oneOnOne.noSessions: There are no 1on1 practice sessions yet. Start with one session from the â€œ1on1 Practice Modeâ€ tab on the result screen.
oneOnOne.totalCaption: Number of 1on1 practice sessions linked to your latest skill map.
oneOnOne.avgCaption: Average of the overallScore in each session summary.
oneOnOne.bestTypeEmpty: Once you accumulate enough sessions, trends by interview type will appear here.
oneOnOne.nextStepBody: Beyond the skill map itself, strengthening your â€œspeaking skillsâ€ in 1on1 practice can meaningfully increase your offer rate. Aim for one realistic mock session per week to build a recent story you can tell with confidence.

emptyState.heading: Letâ€™s start your first diagnosis
emptyState.body: No skill maps have been generated yet. In about 60 seconds, youâ€™ll have a personalised career map.

demoGuide.title: Dashboard: history of diagnoses and 1on1 sessions
demoGuide.description: This page lets you review past diagnoses and 1on1 practice scores at a glance. In the demo video, the full flow (Home â†’ Diagnosis â†’ Result â†’ Dashboard) is shown in about 30â€“60 seconds.

hero.title: Diagnosis complete!
hero.subtitle: Your skill map and job search readiness plan are now ready.

nextSteps.title: Next steps: make this result work for you
nextSteps.description: Donâ€™t stop at just reading the result â€“ use it to drive your learning, job research and interview practice.

learning.title: Progress your learning roadmap
learning.body: Pick just one â€œthis weekâ€ item from the roadmap and start on it. After youâ€™ve taken action, run the diagnosis again to see how your score changes.

jobs.title: Try job matching
jobs.body: Paste in job descriptions youâ€™re interested in to see how well you match and which skills are missing. It becomes easier to see which roles fit you right now.

interview.title: Practice interviews and speak it out
interview.body: Use your skill map as input for 1on1 practice and craft your answers. With STAR-style feedback and session score history, you can track your â€œspeaking skillsâ€ in numbers.

demoGuide.title: Result screen: skill map & next actions
demoGuide.description: On this screen you can switch between tabs to see the skill radar, readiness score, learning plan, career & jobs, and 1on1 practice. In the demo video, we move across â€œOverview â†’ Career & Jobs â†’ 1on1â€ to show the full picture.

tabs.ariaLabel: Switch sections for the skill map result

readiness.title: Job readiness score
readiness.errorFetchDefault: Failed to fetch the readiness score.
readiness.errorSkillMapNotFound: Your diagnosis result could not be found. The underlying skill map may have been deleted. Please run a fresh diagnosis and then reopen this page.
readiness.errorAiFailed: An AI error occurred while calculating the readiness score. Please wait a bit and try again.
readiness.levelMedium: ğŸ“ˆ Can move while still preparing
readiness.levelLow: ğŸŒ± Need to build more foundation first

classCard.title: Your class
classCard.description: This is your current â€œjob/classâ€, based on the category with the highest score.

summary.title: Todayâ€™s takeaway
summary.bodyWithSkill: Youâ€™re a {classLabel} type engineer. If you deepen areas like {firstSkill}, youâ€™ll likely unlock more options for your next move.
summary.bodyNoSkill: Youâ€™re a {classLabel} type engineer. If you focus especially on frontend-related areas, youâ€™ll likely unlock more options for your next move.

overview.comparisonDescription: We overlay your previous analysis with the current one to visualise how your balance has changed.

export.title: Export data
export.description: Copy your skill map data in several formats.

jobMatch.title: Job posting match score
jobMatch.description: Paste the job description text or URL to see how well it matches this skill map, which skills are missing, and a tailored roadmap.

fields.jobTextPlaceholder: Paste the full job description here (responsibilities, required / nice-to-have skills, etc.)

errors.needInput: Please enter either the job description text or the job URL.
errors.matchFailed: Job matching failed. Please check the content and try again later.
errors.skillMapNotFound: Your diagnosis result could not be found. The underlying skill map may have been deleted. Please run the diagnosis again and then try job matching once more.
errors.aiFailed: An AI error occurred while running the job matching analysis. Please wait a bit and try again.

buttons.runMatch: Match this job with my skill map
buttons.insertSample: ğŸ’¡ Insert a sample job description

score.label: Matching score
score.high: Youâ€™re a strong match for this job!
score.medium: You look close â€“ strengthening a few skills could make this a good fit.
score.low: There seems to be a noticeable gap for this role right now.

jobMatch.missingSkillsTitle: Skills that are weak or missing
jobMatch.roadmapTitle: Roadmap to move closer to this job

risk.title: Career risk analysis
risk.description: From your current skill mix, we quantify the risk of â€œskills becoming obsoleteâ€, â€œover-dependence on a specific environmentâ€ and â€œbeing automated awayâ€, and highlight where to strengthen.

errors.analyzeFailed: Career risk analysis failed. Please try again later.
errors.skillMapNotFound: Your diagnosis result could not be found. The underlying skill map may have been deleted. Please run the diagnosis again and then try the career risk analysis.
errors.aiFailed: An AI error occurred while analysing career risks. Please wait a bit and try again.

overall.label: Overall risk score
overall.high: We recommend considering countermeasures in several areas.
overall.medium: The balance is okay overall, but there is room for improvement.
overall.low: Overall, the risk looks relatively low.

obsolescence.label: Obsolescence risk
obsolescence.description: Risk that your skills will lose value as technology trends change.

busFactor.label: Bus factor risk
busFactor.description: Risk of being too tied to a specific environment, team or context.

automation.label: Automation risk
automation.description: Risk that your work could be replaced by AI or tools.

oneOnOne.title: 1on1 practice mode
oneOnOne.intro: Practice answers to common evaluation / interview questions and get feedback plus example answers from an AI manager.

errors.questionsFetch: Failed to load 1on1 questions. Please try again later.
errors.answerMissing: Please enter your answer to the question.
errors.feedbackFailed: Failed to get feedback. Please check your answer and try again later.
errors.saveSessionNoExchanges: Please receive feedback on at least one question before saving.
errors.saveSessionFailed: Failed to save the session. Please try again later.
errors.questionsSkillMapNotFound: The diagnosis result behind this 1on1 session could not be found. The skill map may have been deleted. Please run the diagnosis again and then try the 1on1 practice mode.
errors.questionsAiFailed: An AI error occurred while generating 1on1 questions. Please wait a bit and try again.
errors.feedbackAiFailed: An AI error occurred while generating feedback. Please briefly review your answer and try again later.
errors.saveSessionSummaryAiFailed: An AI error occurred while generating the session summary. You can still review the feedback you received, so consider copying any important text before closing this session.
errors.sessionsFetchFailedDetailed: Failed to fetch the 1on1 session history. If reloading the page doesnâ€™t help, please wait a bit and try again.
errors.sessionsSaveFailedDetailed: Failed to save the 1on1 session. Please check your connection and try again later.

oneOnOne.answerPlaceholder: Write as if you were in a real 1on1. Be as concrete as you can.

ruleScore.title: Overall score (rule-based)
ruleScore.description: We score based on length, concreteness, structure and STAR-like elements.

sessionSummary.title: Session summary
sessionSummary.scoreNote: 1 means â€œneeds workâ€, 5 means â€œvery strongâ€.
sessionSummary.nextStepsTitle: What to do before next time

history.title: Recent 1on1 session history (last 5)
history.empty: No saved sessions yet. Once you get feedback on at least one question and press â€œSave session and show summaryâ€, they will appear here.
history.savedScoreNote: Overall score at the time of saving.

todayTask.title: Todayâ€™s task
todayTask.description: Based on your roadmap and skill map, we suggest a single concrete task to work on today.

errors.generateFailed: Failed to generate todayâ€™s task. Please try again later.
errors.skillMapNotFound: Your diagnosis result could not be found. The underlying skill map may have been deleted. Please run the diagnosis again and then try generating todayâ€™s task.
errors.aiFailed: An AI error occurred while generating todayâ€™s task. Please wait a bit and try again.

hero.title: About this app
hero.subtitle: Overview and tech stack of AI Skill Map Generator
hero.intro: AI Skill Map Generator is a skill mapping and career coaching tool built for early-career web engineers preparing for their first or second job change. Itâ€™s designed so that I can easily explain "how I designed and built this product" in interviews and portfolio reviews.

sections.roleBody: I designed, implemented, and tested the entire project end-to-end on my own.
sections.pricingTitle: Pricing idea (if this were a real product)
sections.pricingBody: Right now this app is available for free as a portfolio project, but in docs/monetization.md I also sketched how I would charge if it were a real service. This section roughly visualises those ideas in the UI.
sections.sceneTitle: How I plan to use this page
sections.sceneBody: In interviews or casual chats, this page works as a guided walkthrough to explain how I thought about, designed, and implemented the app. I can show the actual screens while going deeper into technical decisions and trade-offs.
sections.feedbackBody: If you find parts that are confusing or have ideas like â€œthis feature would be usefulâ€, Iâ€™d really appreciate hearing them. Iâ€™d like to keep evolving this into something that would be usable even in a real-world setting.

inventory.title: Skill inventory
inventory.desc: Use AI to analyse work history and turn it into an explicit skill map.

jobMatch.title: Job matching
jobMatch.desc: Visualise how well you match a job post and where the gaps are.

planning.title: Product & UX design
planning.desc: User stories, flows, and screen structure.

backend.title: Backend
backend.desc: API design using Supabase and OpenAI.

design.title: Design
design.desc: UI tuning, mobile layout, and UX improvements.

free.name: Free (current implementation)
free.description: For the portfolio version, all features are available for free. In a real product, I would likely add some limits on usage volume.
free.features: Diagnosis (skill map / roadmap / risk analysis)|Job matching & portfolio inventory|1on1 practice (with history and score trends)

pro.name: Pro (concept stage)
pro.description: A paid plan for people who want to commit seriously for 1â€“3 months of job hunting (not implemented in this repo).
pro.features: Higher limits on diagnosis runs and 1on1 session saves|More detailed trends for readiness and 1on1 scores|Additional portfolio export templates (e.g. for Findy / CV)

future.items: Higher-precision job matching using company-side position requirements|Visualising long-term growth curves from skill map history|A management / mentor view to help leaders support their team members

hero.title: Usage & terms
hero.subtitle: Usage notes and disclaimers for AI Skill Map Generator
hero.intro: AI Skill Map Generator is published as a demo app and portfolio project by the developer. If you use it in a real job search, please keep the following assumptions and caveats in mind.

provision.title: Service form
provision.content: This app is an individual side project, not a paid commercial service. Features and availability may change or be stopped without prior notice.

data.title: Data handling
items: Skill and work history data you enter is stored in Supabase (Postgres).
The developer may review this data for debugging or improvement purposes.
We do not sell or share this data with third parties, but may use logs and statistics in an anonymised way.
By deleting your account data, you can remove skill maps and usage logs stored in this app.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
items: All analysis results and scores are for reference only and do not guarantee any outcome in your job search.
The developer cannot be held responsible for any damages caused by bugs, outages or service suspension.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions or bug reports about this app, please use GitHub Issues on the repository.

hero.title: Portfolio inventory generator
hero.subtitle: Organise your projects into a compelling portfolio
hero.intro: Paste in your own projects, and the app will suggest the top 3 to highlight plus draft descriptions. Designed to help with interviews and job applications.

errors.deleteFailed: Failed to delete your account data. Please try again later.

hero.title: Delete account data
hero.body: On this page you can delete skill maps, usage logs and other data saved by AI Skill Map Generator. (Deleting the underlying Supabase auth account itself is out of scope.)

status.notLoggedIn: You are not signed in, so we cannot identify which account to delete. Please sign in from the â€œSign inâ€ button first.
status.deleted: Your account data has been deleted. Redirecting to the home page...

confirm.warning: Once deleted, skill map history and usage logs saved in this app cannot be restored.

button.delete: Delete my saved data in this app

locked.body: Please sign in to generate and save your skill map.

skillInput.label: Your skills & work history
skillInput.description: Describe your target roles (e.g. â€œfrontend engineerâ€), technologies you use, and your responsibilities as concretely as you can.
skillInput.placeholder: Example: 3 years as a frontend engineer. Mainly worked on SPA development with React / TypeScript / Next.js. Some experience implementing APIs with Node.js. Hosting mainly on Vercel and Supabase.
skillInput.hint: Please describe your work history and skill set as concretely as you can. You can insert example text using the sample button.
skillInput.sampleAria: Insert sample text into the input field

goal.helper: Choose the option closest to the direction you want to move towards. The AI will slightly bias the skill map and roadmap towards it.

repo.label: GitHub repository URL
repo.hint: If you have a portfolio or related repo, the AI can use it as a hint for your tech stack.

submit.label: Let AI generate my skill map

chat.empty: No messages yet. Ask anything youâ€™d like to explore.
